about_the_game:
Chaos Chain

The Supporter Cosmetic Pack 3 is for people who'd like to show some extra support for Chaos Chain and to help me continue to be able to improve the game. As a thank you, you'll receive 8 unique skins to show off your style as you descend into the shadows of Slade City!

The base game already has over 50 skins to choose from, but this will give you even more.

Exclusives:
  • 1x Detective Skin (Male)
  • 1x Noir Skin (Male)
  • 1x Burglar Skin (Male)
  • 1x Wirehead Skin (Male)
  • 1x Spy Skin (Female)
  • 1x Cyber Shaman Skin (Female)
  • 1x Netrunner Skin (Female)
  • 1x Kawaii Skin (Female)

Extras:
  • 10x Cred - Cred is the currency in Chaos Chain, needed for just about anything and everything!
  • 1x Memory Chip - An extra memory chip which allow you to save the game anytime and anywhere you wish!

PLEASE NOTE: THERE ARE TWO WAYS TO ACTIVATE THIS DLC IN GAME. YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!
---
  • 1 - TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK WITH A *NEW* CHARACTER, JUST CREATE YOUR CHARACTER AND THE DLC WILL AUTOMATICALLY ACTIVATE AFTER CHARACTER CREATION!
  • 2 - TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK WITH A *SAVED* CHARACTER, YOU MUST USE THE PDA ITEM IN YOUR INVENTORY AND SELECT "ACTIVATE DLC".
  • AFTER - THEY CAN THEN BE FOUND IN YOUR STORAGE STASH! YOU CAN GET THE ITEMS ANYTIME YOU WISH!
  • THE SKINS CAN BE EQUIPPED AT YOUR STASH - SELECT "ACCESS WARDROBE" AND THEN SELECT "EXCLUSIVE SKINS"!
